captions.text: This is the first drifting event I took part in.
I won Red Bull Car Park drift two years in a row.
We've been preparing for this competition all year.
The competition is tough this year.
Cars are very powerful.
We made a great effort.
I'm sure I'll win Red Bull Car Park Drift 2013.
Rami Serry
Hany Sharaf
Haitham Samir
Moataz Atef
We're currently in Egypt
and finally the Red Bull Car Park Drift came to life in 2013.
As judges, our lives will be very tough today.
Because a point can decide who is the champion and who is not
Good luck to everyone, and I really hope no one suffers from a mechanical failure and may the best two win.
Red Bull CPD Egypt!
What to do now, Triple Drift?
Ok, let's do it!
It's the first time we participated in such a great championship, which we've been looking forward to for a year and a half.
And as expected, the competition this year was unusual and unlike any other country.
I wasn't expecting to win as I made a mistake on track.
I can't think of anything else right now except what we will do when we go to Dubai
We'll represent Egypt and this is big.
I had a mechanical failure that made me lose the competition.
I congratulate the winners - I'm sure they made the Egyptians proud.
I hope Haitham Samir and Moataz Atef work well together on themselves and their cars
because the competition at Red Bull Car Park Drift finals in Dubai on November 7 & 8 will be hot.
We'll have 16 champions from all over the region. It's not easy,
but they're champions for just being there.

title: Drift Racing in Egypt - Red Bull Car Park Drift 2013
